channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Secure Proxy
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Secure Proxy

item.title: CVE-2021-29749|2024-09-17T03:38:25.613Z -- ibm -- secure%20proxy
item.description: IBM Secure External Authentication Server 6.0.2 and IBM Secure Proxy 6.0.2 is vulnerable to server-side request forgery (SSRF). This may allow an authenticated attacker to send unauthorized requests from the system, potentially leading to network enumeration or facilitating other attacks. IBM X-Force ID: 201777.
